attributes.title: Awful app, DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is so slow. It froze my phone trying to download in the first place and then barely functions as is, taking forever to process information. Not impressed by this app in the slightest. The information is outdated and I am constantly sent spam texts and calls after providing my number. Do not get, it is not worth the trouble

attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️🥰💅✨
attributes.review: I downloaded it and as soon as i opened it, it started trying to build a wall over all of my other apps including tiktok. The app then started telling me things that clowns do. #cierra2020 i was extremely disappointed with everythjmg associated with this app. I would love to sPeAk To ThE mAnAgEr. As a member of the Gen Z community, we do not accept this and will not pass it on, but demolish it. This. Is. War.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: it’s so glitchy and for a “news” app it is verrrry bias. unbelievable. i want good honest coverage of the news and headlines not trumps side or it, witch by the way isn’t even democratic or republic, he’s just saying whatever he wants. about the app every time i click on a paper it logs me out of the app and every time i enter the app i have to enter my information every single time. it’s useless

attributes.title: Horrible App!
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to support our wonderful president! However, it broke my phone, erased all my messages, deleted all my pictures and apps, and stole $560 from my credit card account! My sister also downloaded it, and it apparently deleted all her contacts and stole ALL her information. Thanks to this, I will no longer be supporting trump in the 2020 election campaign. VOTE BERNIE!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: THIS APP IS STUPID I AM RUNNING
attributes.review: i hate this app as soon as i opened it i saw a Cheeto and i don’t like cheetos so i was very scared and started crying i saw it start to move and talk and now i am scared for life now i have to see my therapist again and she thinks i’m crazy and wants to send me to a mental hospital so now i’m on the run if your my therapist i’m sorry and if you don’t want this to happen to you i suggest you don’t download it.

attributes.title: Killed my phone
attributes.review: I got this app to keep up with the rally’s in my area. It the worst app I have ever gotten. It crashed my phone! As soon as I tried to open it, my phone started over heating and crashed. I wasn’t able to turn it on all day. I’ve deleted the app now and my phone is back to normal, but I’m still getting notifications from the app? What is going on?!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: I got this app in hopes of supporting my orange king! I opened it up and it IMMEDIATELY crashed! I restarted my phone and when I tried to open different apps they were all corrupted! I opened the app again and all i got was an error message and then it crashed again!!! I ended up having to delete the app and put my phone in rice. DO NOT download this app... I might have to get a new phone!

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP. First of all it asked me for my phone number and wouldn’t give me an option to not get messages. Then once I finally agreed my phone started acting up constantly. One second it’s be 80% the next it’s be 2% I just don’t get it. This app has slowly ruined my phone just like trump to think country and I refuse to give it one more chance

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!
attributes.review: hate it. first, it look SOOOO long to download!! like come on non of my other apps do this, so it obviously just yours! ugh! once it finally downloaded the app didn’t even work properly!! it glitched like crazy, wouldn’t let me click any of the buttons, and was just absolutely terrible. DO NOT RECOMMEND!! don’t get this app! someone needs to fix it, i wish i could give 0 stars.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: When I was using this app my keyboard was glitching and typing at such a slow rate. My phone would go crazy sometimes, at first I thought something was wrong with my phone... No no no it was this app. I think this app has a virus or something I would advice you to not get this app, but if you want your phone to stop working then by all means. Get yourself the Trump 2020 App.
